title: Portfolio v1
description: A portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and achievements in web and mobile app development.

title: HackOverFlow2k24 Website
description: Developed a responsive event website for HackOverFlow2k24 using React.js and Tailwind CSS, enabling smooth promotion and participant registration.

title: Code Combat Exam Portal
description: Built a scalable quiz platform for the NIPUNA event, supporting 300+ registrations. Handled over 200 concurrent users with smooth performance and reliability.

title: Expenses Tracker App
description: The Expenses Tracker App helps users monitor and manage spending with a clean, user-friendly interface. It offers categorized tracking and insights to support smarter financial decisions.

title: Zebronics Watch Landing Page
description: Created a landing page for Zebronics Watch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing product features with an interactive and responsive design.

title: Netflix UI Clone
description: Built a responsive Netflix UI clone using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive elements, sleek layout, smooth animations, and dynamic responsiveness.

title: Temperature Converter
description: A simple, functional web app that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

title: SRKRCSE Department Website
description: A departmental website for SRKR CSE, for accessing Lecture Notes, Contact details, Events, News , Timetables, Syllabus and so on.

title: React Cursor
description: A modern collection of customizable and animated cursor packs built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui â€” designed for developers who want to enhance their UI with creative cursor styles.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game using Hand Gesture Recognition
description: Built a real-time Rock-Paper-Scissors game using React and TensorFlow.js with hand gesture recognition via webcam. Integrated AI-powered Handpose model for gesture classification and dynamic score tracking against a computer opponent.

title: Fruit Ninja Game with Index Finger Gesture
description: Built a real-time Rock-Paper-Scissors game using React and TensorFlow.js with hand gesture recognition via webcam. Integrated AI-powered Handpose model for gesture classification and dynamic score tracking against a computer opponent.
